name: Prepohra
tagline: Bash game to learn Czech preposition cases
body:
Prepo-Hra
========

Prepo-hra is a funny little game in bash language to learn Czech preposition cases.

Screenchot:
----------

           Welcome to

          #-#-#-#-#-#-
          Prepo-Hra :D
          #-#-#-#-#-#-

         ->  Start!
             Scores
             Help
             Quit

Installation:
------------

- To install topchrono, go inside the unzipped folder and launch the following script in sudo mode:

install.sh

Uninstallation:
--------------

- To uninstall topchrono, go inside the unzipped folder and launch the following script in sudo mode:

uninstall.sh

Enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
